column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I stood at the train station with my luggage bags waiting to take the train to the nearest airport .
#text=I took the train solely due to convenience of not having to drive my car and leave it at the airport .
#text=Once the train arrived at the destination , I picked up my bags and headed in to take my seat .
#text=I took a compartment all to myself as there were not many other people on the same train .
#text=As a result , I got to relax and have a compartment with complete silence , where I then took a nap .
#text=Moments later , an attendant came by to check everyone 's tickets .
#text=I showed him my ticket , to which he tore off the perforated bottom portion and handed the ticket back to me .
#text=Once the train arrived at the airport about 45 minutes later , I grabbed my luggage and headed out of the compartment to the front of the train .
#text=I exited the train and went to my flight .
